name: Endangered (itch)
description:
You've crash landed on Earth and now you have to find your friends and return home!

A Game By:

Connor Blankenship

Alyssa Dettling

Mason Eastman

Joseph Horak

Jasper Murphy

Kelly Shen

Steve Wang

Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080 (16:9)

A and D or Arrow Keys for Movement

Space for Jump

'Q' on title scene to Quit
